t=input()
while t>0:
    t-=1
    n=input()
    pies=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    racks=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    count=0
    pies.sort() #pies=sorted(pies,reverse=1) in descending
    racks.sort() #racks=sorted(racks) in ascending order
    for i in pies:
        for j in racks:
            if i<=j:
                racks.remove(j)
                count+=1
                break
    print count
